actions.description: The kruthik makes two Stab or Spike attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Stab

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spike

actions.description: The kruthik sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
specialTraits.name: Pack Tactics

specialTraits.description: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
specialTraits.name: Tunneler
